mapper.select: SELECT t_role.id, t_role.available, t_role.description, t_role.role, t_permission.`name`, t_permission.permission, t_permission.url FROM (t_permission, t_role) RIGHT JOIN t_role_permission ON t_permission.id = t_role_permission.permission_id AND t_role_permission.role_id = t_role.id WHERE t_role.id=#{roleId}
SELECT * FROM t_permission Order BY id desc
